Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.analysis.hunspell.SortingStrategy

Packages that use SortingStrategy
Package
Description
org.apache.lucene.analysis.hunspell
A Java implementation of Hunspell stemming and spell-checking algorithms (Hunspell), and a stemming TokenFilter (HunspellStemFilter) based on it.

  • Uses of SortingStrategy in org.apache.lucene.analysis.hunspell

    Methods in org.apache.lucene.analysis.hunspell that return SortingStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static SortingStrategy
    SortingStrategy.inMemory()
    The strategy that loads all entries as String objects and sorts them in memory.
    static SortingStrategy
    SortingStrategy.offline(Directory tempDir, String tempFileNamePrefix)
    An "offline" strategy that creates temporary files in the given directory and uses them for sorting with OfflineSorter.
